About Me

Bio


Hi there, I’m Denieall. I’m a fresh graduate, eager to gather knowledge and explore new technologies. I have 3 months of working experience as an intern at BizAid Technologies. During my internship there, I have built a specialized web browser using C# to fill up forms and submit them automatically using data from SQL Server with iMacros .NET Component for big clients like UEM and Khazanah. I have also handled clients, fixed errors in code and add features to the company software, Corporate Information System (CIS). In my spare time, I usually participate in online courses such as Udemy and watch short Youtube video tutorials to experiment with new technologies.
